name.ja: セレマテック・クラティス

text.en:
2 Level 8 monsters
Each time your opponent activates a Trap Card or effect, or a monster effect, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when it resolves (max. 9). If this card would be destroyed, you can detach 1 material from this card instead. You can remove 3 Spell Counters from this card; apply 1 of these effects.
● Add 1 Spell or 1 Spellcaster Effect Monster from your Deck to your hand.
● Special Summon 1 Spellcaster monster from your hand or Deck.
You can only use this effect of "Thelematech Cratis" once per turn.
